title: Calories in a Mini Cucumber
meta_description: Learn calories in a mini cucumber, plus full nutrition facts like carbs, protein, fiber, and easy tweaks for your snacks.
assumptions: Average mini cucumber (~60 g), raw, unpeeled, fresh; no added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, freshness, and growing conditions. Check produce labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A mini cucumber contains about 9 calories and provides hydration with minimal carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a mini cucumber?
faqs.a: Approximately 9 kcal for one average mini cucumber (~60 g).

faqs.q: Are mini cucumbers low in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, about 2.2 g carbs per mini cucumber, mostly from natural sugars.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a mini cucumber?
faqs.a: Roughly 0.4 g protein, making it a low-protein veggie.

faqs.q: Does peeling a mini cucumber change calories?
faqs.a: Slightly; peeling reduces calories by ~1 kcal and removes some fiber.

faqs.q: How does a mini cucumber compare to a regular one?
faqs.a: A mini (~60 g) has fewer calories (~9 kcal) than a medium (~150 g, ~23 kcal).
